casebody.data:
S.C., Appellant-Petitioner,
v.
NEW JERSEY DEPARTMENT OF CHILDREN AND FAMILIES, Respondent-Respondent. C-642 September Term 2018
081870 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 08, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-004792-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the appellant may serve and file a supplemental brief on or before May 7, 2019, and respondent may serve and file a supplemental brief forty-five (45) days after the filing of appellant's supplemental submission, or, if appellant declines to file such a submission, on or before June 21, 2019.
